channel.title: Adding new shop, and need certain player rights to open it?
channel.description: Alright, these tuts were deleted so can somebody give me a quick walkthrough? I just wanna know how to make shops with certain npcs...i also wanna know how to make it so u need to be a mod to open it? IK how to spawn the npc, i just need to know how to make it so they can open the shop or w/e...
